arts.ttl: Frustrated Marseille fans demand Mason Greenwood 'get moving' with giant banner unfurled before game - and former Man United star responds by scoring TWICE in 5-1 rout
arts.sum: The former Manchester United forward has recently been the subject of several damning reports that have raised questions over his attitude at Marseille.

arts.sum: Speaking in an explosive interview with La Provence, Olympique de Marseille director of football Medhi Benatia has said that a potential non-qualifcation to the Champions League would have far-reaching consequences…

arts.ttl: Roberto De Zerbi considering Marseille base camp in Italy for rest of season
arts.sum: With the club gripped by internal tension and the external pressure of battling for UEFA Champions League qualification, Marseille manager Roberto De Zerbi is is considering an extraordinary step to…

arts.ttl: ‘People inside the club are trying to cause trouble’ – Marseille director of football Medhi Benatia
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille director of football Medhi Benatia spoke to La Provence in an interview ahead of Les Olympiens’ must-win fixture against Ligue 1’s bottom side in Montpellier this evening (21:05 CET). The…

arts.ttl: Mason Greenwood saga escalates as Marseille chief issues furious response to bust-up claims
arts.sum: Mason Greenwood is enjoying a positive first season with French side Marseille since joining from Manchester United but there have been rumours of a rift in the camp amid a rotten run of form

arts.ttl: Montpellier predicted XI v Marseille: experience sidelined as Téji Savanier drops to bench
arts.sum: There will be a complete squad overhaul at Montpellier HSC this summer with the likes of Téji Savanier, Andy Delort, Benjamin Lecomte, Wahbi Khazri, Issiaga Sylla, and Jordan Ferri all…

arts.ttl: Marseille predicted XI v Montpellier: Jonathan Rowe to drop to bench, Amine Gouiri to return to line-up
arts.sum: Jonathan Rowe was a surprise starter against AS Monaco last weekend for Olympique de Marseille, however, Amine Gouiri is expected to be in the starting line-up when OM face Montpellier…

arts.ttl: Mason Greenwood: Marseille stars REFUSE to play with ex-Man Utd star
arts.sum: Benatia, a former Bayern Munich and Juventus centre-back, was particularly referring to rumours claiming that former Tottenham Hotspur midfielder Hojbjerg, one of OM’s best players this season, went to his office and told him to stop playing Luis Henrique, a rumoured transfer target for Arsenal, and Greenwood . Such is the strength of these rumours that sporting director Medhi Benatia has been forced to respond to them in the local press amid a catastrophic run of form that has seen Marseille lose five of their last seven to put their hopes of Champions League football under serious question.
